text:
Draught @ Moeder Lambic Fontainas, Place Fontainas 8, Brussels, Belgium 1000. [ As CRAK / Magic Rock - Black Infusion ].Clear dark black brown color with a large, frothy - creamy, good lacing, mostly lasting, off-white to beige head. Aroma is moderate malty, dark malt, fruity, tropical fruit, black currant, passion fruit - star fruit. Flavor is moderate sweet with a long duration, perfume, floral - herbal, dark malt, sweet malt, black currant. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is soft. [20160916]
 7-4-6-3-13
Birra che non mi ha stupito. Ci sono anche sentori gradevoli, ma ha un amaro che un po stona ed è slegato dal resto.

Bottle from Mi-orge Mi-houblon, Arlon - BE. Color: deep dark black beer with no carbonation and small white foam. Smell: caramel and toffee malt domination. Sweet and spicy notes. Cardamon. Taste: light body with caramel toffee malt. Strong sweet alt, balanced with herbal and spicy finish. Quiet drinkable. Good attenuation. Aftertaste: spicy and malty.

On tap @Bir&Fud (Rome). Bruna scura, impenetrabile, schiuma color beige, mediamente persistente. Al naso sentori tostati ed erbacei, caffè verde, cannella, frutta rossa. In bocca è molto ben equilibrata, dolciastra con finale amaro corretto, ma forse un po pretenziosa, stucchevole alla lunga, non lascia il segno. Corpo medio, carbonazione corretta. Così così...

on tap @Señor Lúpulo. Despacho de cervezas, Gijón 10/12/2016
Color negro, sabor malta, notas especiadas, cuerpo ligero, agradable

On bottle @domus birrae. Really curios to try this collab. Mild is not my style, but this one has an unexpected spiced(cinnamon?), red fruits flavor. Taste follow the flavor. Low body and really dry. Good surprise.

On tap at La Fine Mousse, Paris on 27th November 2016. Rated as a novelty ale. Deep sepia with light tan foam and scant lacing. Roast malt aroma. Very herbal in-mouth with notes of green tea, coriander and lemongrass. The first two of these dominate the finish. Medium-bodied with a zingy mouthfeel.

Bottle sample at a tasting at troubless place. Thanks Stas. Brown with a beige head. Aroma of piney hops, toast, a bit of caramel, a bit of earth. Sweetish flavor with malt, toast, a bit of caramel, nuts, some fruitiness, fruity and piney hops, and a bitter finish. Light to medium-bodied. Pretty nice.
Drors Place, Pours dirty brown with a beige head, aroma of hops, orange, nuts, dark bread, flavor is malty with raspberries, apricot, yeast, medium bodied

Draft at Moeder Lambic Fontainas. Near black with a big tan head. Aroma of overripe dark fruit, star fruit, tobacco, floral notes, perfume, artificial red fruits and malt. Flavour is moderate sweet and bitter. Light medium bodied with soft carbonation. [17-09-2016]

Colore marrone morbido, torbida, schiuma beige sottile. Aroma di malto e caramello con un pizzico di tostatura. Al palato è molto interessante, dolce e complessa con sentori di frutta. Carbonazione bassa.

UPDATED: SEP 10, 2016 Keg at Brewdog Bologna. An opaque black coloured pour with a lasting mid tan head. Aroma is tangy citrus lemon, earthy pine eye hop, dry roasted grains, hint of smoke. Flavour is composed of bitter sour lemon, sour lemon, burnt toast, woody pine. Palate is medium light, spritzy carbonation. Bitter lemon. Not a huge fan. Not a mild.
From tap. Pours pitch black with a small tan head. Aroma is overripe fruity. Berries. Bergamotte. Dark maæty, rather fruity. Dry. Thin bodied. Dry, bitter and solid fruity. Lingering fruity finish.

Cask  Huge cream-coloured head over black beer with a redbrown sheen. (Blood)oranges, red fruit, raspberry(jam); intense even through the huge head. Dark malts, dry hops, fruit only in the finish/background. Very slowly, raspberry announces itself. Sweetness is there too, but the hops, as well as the dark dryish malts, keep it tempered. Light body but slick. Typical cask carbonation. The raspberry is just a tad too jam-like. For the rest, this is an outstanding blendbeer.

Draft @ ML Fontainas, Italian Beer Wknd #5. 
Couleur brune foncée, sur un voile presque acajou-pourpre, col crémeux blanc-cassé.
Arôme au nez complexe alternant sur des notes fruitées noires, rappelant la mûre et un malté plutôt cara pâle et une sorte dherbacé en infusion arrivant en rétro nasal.
Palais est malté, léger rappelant une infusion de thé noir avec une présence fruitée noire voire même de baies. Le tout est léger et très surprenant, tirant sur la framboise et la mûre. Pointe de grillé, accompagnement herbacé toujours ponctué par le fruité noire.

(Thx! for sharing!) Sampled draft @ Italian BEER Week-End #5. Black, solid mocha head. Smells like a blueberry muffin, damn that is brilliant, mocha, coffee, sweet, faint raspberry, Taste is sweet mocha, soy hazelnut milk  mocha flavoured, low blueberry, sweet, easy, instant chocolate milk powder, tea, mocha, Pretty awesome, rich & interesting. Body is a touch, low thin, faintly mocha flavoured hazelnut-milk. Very rich & intense. More beers like this please.
bottled on 4/7/16 scura biona schiuma buona persistenza naso un po tisana frutti agrume in bocca piu caffe poi fruttato lieve tannico amaro medio

UPDATED: AUG 11, 2016 Draught @ BierBier. Poured cola brown color with a thin white head. Strong herbal, sweet woody like aroma, red currant? Some roasty aspects as well. Flavor has herbs, ash, wood, salty crackers,  berries.  Quite bodied for 4%. Interesting spiciness.

Tap at Makeda in Rome-Italy. Pours coffee bean color, persistent off white foam. Nice. Nose: wow! Orange, red fruit, pomegranate. Some feel of balsamic. Terrific. Mouth: so nice, balsamic notes, forest fruit, bit watery but with great character. Bravo!

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
